summary: Syntax highlighting for scripting in the Torque game engines
name: Torquescript-syntax-highlighting
description: This script allows for full syntax highlighting of TorqueScript, the scripting language for the family of Torque Game Engines.
install_details:
Place the torque.vim into your vim runtime directory in the syntax subdirectory. The filetype.vim needs to be copied/merged into the vim runtime directory as well. 
filetype.vim performs automatic loading of Torquescript syntax for files with the correct script extensions. 
See the Readme.txt for any additional details.
